website_summaries.verdict: Exceptional scissors for home or office use. Blades are extremely sharp and hard-wearing.
pros: Crafted from carbonitride titanium, these scissors' blades are eight times harder than regular stainless steel, plus they stay sharper for longer
The ergonomic handle is comfortably rubberized and has high leverage to make cutting more comfortable
cons: Handles are too snug for some

customer_reviews.title: Repeat purchase I liked them so much
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an 8" pair while travelling because I had an immediate need. They are comfortable to work with, very sharp and a well thought out but simple design. They performed so well I bought the 7" & 9" combo pack and finally threw out the funky old scissors I had that didn't work so well anymore. I guess these scissors won a Good Design Award in 2016. Not sure if that is some marketing hype or not, but they perform very well, are comfortable - and like I said, I bought the combo pack after buying a the 8" version and being very pleased with the design.
customer_reviews.author: Groundoggy

customer_reviews.title: comfortable heavy-duty scissors
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a pair of sharp, strong, comfortable heavy-duty scissors, and these certainly are just that. They are borderline shears -- suitable for cutting heavy cardboard and semi-rigid plastic as well as thin paper. Some users may find them to be a tad too large, but for me (I'm 6'2" and have large hands) they are very ergonomically comfortable and easy to use. Solid, sharp, stout, and extremely well made. Multi-purpose scissors that I am sure to use often. Bravo Westcott.
customer_reviews.author: Rabidranath

customer_reviews.title: Best scissors I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Best scissors I have ever owned -- PERIOD! And VERY affordable! High quality scissors (shears) can be very expensive, but not necessarily better than this item! However, I would prefer if it was straight rather than bent (these are kinda like dressmaker's shears). Westcott DOES have a straight Carbo Titanium product -- but it is an inch shorter. I would also prefer if the blades were a bit longer (they are 4 inches in length -- 4-1/2 would have been better). From what I can tell, Westcott does not make a product such as I have described -- but I am HAPPY to make do with this item!
customer_reviews.author: The Penitent

customer_reviews.title: WAY too big a grip for medium small hands.
customer_reviews.text: These are very well made, sharp scissors, but for my medium-small female hands they're way too big and extremely uncomfortable. I've taped then (layers and layers) and they're better now, but will never be a really good fit. I can't open them open as wide as I'd like, either - again, because of the size of the grips. It's not that I have odd hands - I've never experienced this problem before with scissors. The blades are also very tight, though I guess the screw can be loosened a bit for that. Gave these 3 stars somewhat reluctantly because they do seem so well constructed. But I doubt I'll use them much.
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA

customer_reviews.title: Cut through heavy fabric like it is butter
customer_reviews.text: I love these scissors! They are the best scissors I've ever used hands down! I just bought a pair of titanium Fiskar sewing scissors and only one of the two pair I bought worked, they don't even come close to my Westcott scissors which technically are not sewing scissors but cut right through 4 layers of canvas as if it was butter. This is a great buy and the price is also great even at $3 more than what I paid for them. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: susan yoder

customer_reviews.title: These really rock!  Strongest  and sturdiest around.
customer_reviews.text: The blades are so strong they really cut through anything you need. I have never found sturdier scissors in my life. However beware of the regular nonstick Wescott 8" because they break easy and only this kind has a big metal bolt for the pivot axis. The thick blades and center pivot bolt make these rock stars on cutting anything heavy. Get these for about $6.50 at the writing and be proud. I love my 8" Fiscars titanium nonstick soft grip for flowers but these are needed for the thick stems and will not disappoint guaranteed.
customer_reviews.author: Rockin Roller

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome all-purpose scissors and didn't even need scissors to open the package they came in! Nice! I bought these to replace my utility kitchen scissors that were dull, so my family would stop using my expensive Wustoff scissors for non-food stuff. They slice right through paper and thin plastic without even having to cut, or rather, move your fingers. They cut through thicker plastic as well with no struggle or frustration. They have a nice, solid feel and weight, and comfortable grips for your fingers. I will eventual replace all of my scissors with these. I suggest buying several pairs, if you can afford it, as you'll want to keep a pair handy everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Shiloh

customer_reviews.title: Great scissors! Probably the best I've ever used: Super sharp, strong materials/good quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent scissors! Super sharp & very well made. I'm sad I waited so long to purchase these. I had thought my old scissors were good. Unfortunately I was wrong. My old scissors were just OK and not as high quality as these new very sharp, sturdy, well made scissors. Don't be frustrated with your old, poor quality scissors. I would highly recommend these scissors as I own many!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best household scissors that can do a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for good regular scissors for decades. These are the best that I have ever seen. They are much better than the regular titanium scissors. The patent is still pending on this, but it is Westcott's top of the line right now. They just cut so perfectly and so easily, no struggle whatsoever and clean cuts. I've put my name in permanent ink on them because I won't share! (but I will buy anyone else in the household who wants a pair, their own.) I think I will soon be getting additional ones for the house in general anyway because I have no interest in using any other scissors anymore. Why use something inferior.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of scissors
customer_reviews.text: You wouldn't expect the level of quality on a pair of shears at this price. These are some mighty fine scissors, and I've always been partial to the Fiskars brand. These are solid, heavy-duty, good strong hinge, and sharp enough to shave hairs off your arm if you try. Very comfortable to hold, as well. All in all, a great purchase, and I'll probably buy another pair since I'm so satisfied with these.
customer_reviews.author: The consumer's voice

customer_reviews.title: Not that heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and questions before purchasing. A lot of reviews saying that this was perfect for cutting cardboard. It is not. It cut cleanly for the first few cuts. Now it just tears the cardboard. Nothing close to a clean cut. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: TattedTotoro

customer_reviews.title: Trash your old scissors!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can cut again. I got so exasperated with my scissors that I was ripping what little hair I have out. I broke the pinkie finger on my right hand and had to have it splinted for over a month. (Of course I am right-handed). The splint was wrapped in that stretchy bandaid tape. I tried to cut the tape with every scissor I had. I finally chucked them all and ordered these. One of my better decisions. Trust me, if your scissors are full.. toss the darned things and buy new ones! Don’t even try to salvage or save the old ones. These cut well using my left hand.
customer_reviews.author: kphaTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Powerfully Sharp Scissors
customer_reviews.text: These are the best pair of scissors I have ever owned. I specifically looked for a pair made by Westcott since I knew a pair I had that lasted for years had served me well. These cut through all types of things and thicknesses easily. I bought two pairs and may buy some more they make in different styles. The Teflon coated blades makes it easy to cut through thick glued cardboard without the blades sticking. The blades are very sharp so you need to be careful. I highly recommend this product and have in no way received anything from anyone to endorse it.
customer_reviews.author: Honesty Counts

customer_reviews.title: Great Scissors with a nasty musty smell
customer_reviews.text: I gave these scissors a 4 star only because they have a strong musty odor that I can't get rid of. I can smell them when ever I walk into my craft room. Annoying to say the least. Other than the smell, they are a great pair of shears! Cut like a dream. If anyone knows how to get rid of the odor, please let me know. The plastic handles are the culprit.
customer_reviews.author: S. Butzin

customer_reviews.title: These are the best
customer_reviews.text: These shears are kickass. This is my second pair. Nothing is wrong with my first, as it still cuts clean and true after a year of moderate use. I grew tired of retrieving them from my truck to use inside my house (and vice versa). Quality product. Can’t think of any cons. Use to cut fabrics of all types. It will cut cardboard with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Great scissors
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a couple of different models of Westcott scissors and all of them have done a superb job. These are so inexpensive there is no reason to have a dull pair of scissors around the house. I just have to get my wife to not keep them. Ditch them when they are dull. I have not had to ditch a pair of Westcott scissors yet and have owned them for over 9 months with medium use.
customer_reviews.author: Tb2k82CE

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: In short, I. Love. These. Scissors! I have my own business with paper crafting and I hand cut most of what i work with. The handle is comfortable, and actually fits all 4 of my fingers. I've gone through sever different, cheaper pairs before giving up and purchasing these. I would have saved money if I had just bought these to begin with. They fit so wonderfully, and I am able to cut through 6 sheets of 24lb paper with ease. I can't express how wonderful these scissors are!
customer_reviews.author: Charity T.

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect with one exception
customer_reviews.text: These scissors are awesome. They cut really well and make quick work of most things. BUT, did you really have to skimp on the bolt holding them together? Yeah, the cutting portion didn't rust but the bolt sure did. If that was improved, 5+ stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kimba

customer_reviews.title: ... these to cut window screen and it cut through like butter. Since then
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to cut window screen and it cut through like butter. Since then, I've used the scissors to cut down heavy duty cardboard for recycling. Very easy to use. I have other scissors by Westcott and they hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny T-S

customer_reviews.title: Cuts well; 9" scissors are not fitted for smaller hands
customer_reviews.text: They seem like well made scissors, sharp enough for fabric, but I agree with some of the other reviews, I have medium-sized female hands, and the handles for the 9" scissors are way to big to be comfortable to use without alterations. The 7" ones are fine. I wrapped fabric and string on the handles and loosened the tension on the screw and it's better, but I don't think I could use it for an extended amount of time without discomfort. It now looks like it's owned by a crafty pirate. If you've got big bear mitts, these are the scissors you've been dreaming about.
customer_reviews.author: sadie merlow

customer_reviews.title: FIVE STAR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I bought these scissors after seeing them for sale at Staples for $26. I researched a lot of scissors for cutting fabric. Most of them had iffy reviews. After reading the reviews on these they seemed pretty good. So after using them I can assure you, they are five star quality! They easily cut a carpet pad. I highly recommended them to anyone considering them. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Dee

customer_reviews.title: Best Scissors Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best pair of all-purpose scissors/shears bar none! These are surprisingly durable and hold there sharpness better than any other scissors I’ve had. So far, at least in my experience, they will cut anything that will fit between the blades. I’ve used these for prepping chicken(cuts chicken bone), cutting veggies, wooden popsicles(school projects), and even trimming and pruning rose bushes. Probably not what they’re recommended for, but isn’t a problem for these bad boys!
customer_reviews.author: Matt A.

customer_reviews.title: Great shears.. Very Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Just what they say they are, and I’ve got the slice on my finger to prove it. No it wasn’t the scissors’ fault, I’m just kind of a dumba** that way sometimes. Try to use them outside their proper design purpose and there you have it! Love the scissors, love the brand, have never been let down by this manufacturer. But please believe them when they warn you that they’re sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Good Solid Scissors.
customer_reviews.text: Good solid scissors. They feel good holding and cutting. I have not cut through metal or anything terribly tough but they do cut easily through heavy cardboard packaging pretty well. Will update if I get to put them through a tougher test but I generally use my heavy duty cutting devices for that.
customer_reviews.author: Qbert77375

customer_reviews.title: great for 30 days
customer_reviews.text: loved these from Jan 1st through about Feb 4th , went to cut a piece of bubble wrap and I might have well used my fingers. useless - save your $$$. and never abused only cut paper, bubble wrap and cardboard tops.
customer_reviews.author: Blueskin

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this heavy duty pair of scissors.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this because it seemed to be very well made and very strong. We keep it in the kitchen, but use it for everything. Replaced just a normal pair of scissors that got dull very fast. Seems to cut anything.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson G. Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Just Absolutely Love These Scissors
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Wescott Scissors before(though no the same type) but, these are just built to last. They really are top grade scissors for a cheap price. Really can’t say anything against them. I guess it would be cool if were all titanium haha.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Better than kitchen shears!
customer_reviews.text: Cut through chicken bones better than my kitchen shears, and then slices through the skin and meat like it's a piece of paper. Effortless and effective, unlike my kitchen shears that required a lot of muscle to cut through bones, and lost their sharpness quickly, so couldn't cut through skin or meat smoothly. I bought these scissors for my kitchen, and I'm glad I did. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: runner

customer_reviews.title: Really sharp!
customer_reviews.text: These scissors have stayed sharp through cutting paper, cardboard, plastic and a bit of wire for months. I have arthritis and while they are not 'ergonomic' necessarily, they are comfortable to cut with. I recommend these to anyone who is tired of buying scissors that dull within a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Emntnmama

customer_reviews.title: Good scissors
customer_reviews.text: There scissors cut well and are definitely heavy-duty, at least compared to the run-of-the -mill scissors that I usually buy, and the price is decent. I just don't like having had to buy the combo pack when I only needed the 9" scissors.
customer_reviews.author: ogecko

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and comfortable, great quality
customer_reviews.text: These scissors are sharp and comfy to hold. They come apart with a screw so they can be sharpened professionally. These are a bit more money than some of the cheap asian ones on Amazon but I am very glad happy my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tennis4Ever

customer_reviews.title: Finally, scissors that will last.
customer_reviews.text: These are my "keep in the kitchen, open the mail and UPS packages" scissors. Much more durable than the junk I've bought at Staples. They are working great, I bought another pair to keep in my work shop, so far I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: AlohaDesert

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp
customer_reviews.text: came out of the package very sharp and have held their edge. I use them on the workshop, cutting a lot of plastic packaging open and cutting double-sided tape, which these cut better than the other pairs I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry010101

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best scissors I have owned. I work in education and use scissors nearly every day. Somedays for a long period of time. These scissors feel like great quality. They are extremely sharp and cut through materials with ease. I will be purchasing more in my future. Do not hesitate to buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Feel cheap!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how this got so many 5 star reviews. These scissors are uncomfortable to use and the blades don't open and close smoothly. I'm sending them back and getting something else.
customer_reviews.author: Roger S.

customer_reviews.title: When you want the best.....
customer_reviews.text: I was sick of my family always borrowing and losing my scissors, so I went out and bought the mack daddy of all scissors. These babies are super well made, very heavy duty, and exactly what I wanted. I also threatened every other family member not to touch them. Extra pro- twice as expensive at Staples.
customer_reviews.author: TheReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Right-handed scissors are not returnable
customer_reviews.text: These scissors are for a right-handed person and they are NOT returnable! I am left-handed and I would not have bought them if the description specified this. Now I can't use them. That is why I deducted 2 stars. If you are right-handed, they will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Elam

customer_reviews.title: Super Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Wow ... definitely a super sharp and sturdy blade. It feels very durable and will cut through the toughest chicken breast bone or whatever packaging material. I own several scissors .. and this replaced my flimsy OXO scissor.
customer_reviews.author: JD305

customer_reviews.title: The best scissors ever!
customer_reviews.text: I had this scissors before and it can cut a lot of things. It's strong and sharp. I order new ones because I just want to use them only for my fabric project. I'd recommend this scissors to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great scissors. If they're not too big, buy them. You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I don't have anything bad to say about these scissors. They are fabulous. I returned mine because they were too big for my needs. I can't find a single pair of scissors, that are smaller, that even come close.
customer_reviews.author: SW Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Great scissors and heavy duty. Although they are heavy duty they are easy to use and fit in your hand just right. I even ordered another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica D.

customer_reviews.title: Great scissors.
customer_reviews.text: My son have this scissor the big one and I got two one big and one small. I love the way it cut almost anything. I wanted to used in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen M Rodriguez-Rios

customer_reviews.title: Well balanced
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased withe this product. One usually think about scissors being sharp. These are but also well balanced in your hand when using. These are comfortable to use especially if you have dexterity issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mee

customer_reviews.title: Best Scissors Ever
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and have used many types of scissors. These are by far my favorite ever. Very durable and have lasted. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Always need a pair of sharp scissors handy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for stocking stuffers for my adult children. They all loved them. Bought a pair for myself. Great for removing all the plastic wrap on everything you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Detroit

customer_reviews.title: Best Scissors EVER
customer_reviews.text: purchased these at the recommendation of my daughter. These are the best scissors I have ever used - HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dorrie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable + Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: These shears are so comfortable and will cut through many materials easily. Maybe get the 9 in for cutting fabric for sewing. I have many brands of more expensive scissors but these are one of my faves!
customer_reviews.author: Shirlie

customer_reviews.title: Best workhorse scissors on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much that I bought an extra pair. Cuts through those annoying plastic blister packages like butter. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Yliana

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sharpness and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Best pair of scissors I’ve ever bought. Bought a set for the tool cabinet in the garage. May buy some for the home too. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: James J. Bender

customer_reviews.title: Cuts Well
customer_reviews.text: Has cut through package material very easily. Hard plastic can be awkward, this made it easy
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these. They are kept put up where the grand kids cant get them even though they are not my good fabric scissors. I like them, great every day scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: very good scirrors
customer_reviews.text: I would purchase these if you are looking for a good scirrors for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: C. E. phayre

customer_reviews.title: needed to be sharpened but then worked good
customer_reviews.text: strong scissor but needed to sharpen it Too expensive if it needs sharpening
customer_reviews.author: Lololori Show /on YouTube

customer_reviews.title: Torn package
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to give as Christmas gift but the product package torn. Too late to get another and was also another seller
customer_reviews.author: skeptic by birth

customer_reviews.title: Best scissors ever!
customer_reviews.text: The best scissors I have used in a long time. Love the shape design, so sharp. Are a joy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Cuts multiple layers without a struggle
customer_reviews.text: Performs as stated. I was sharpening all my scissors constantly and they were not doing the job. I needed scissors that will cut through multiple layers of fabric or felt without a struggle. These Westcott scissors have provided a solution to my cutting cunC
customer_reviews.author: N. Dillard

customer_reviews.title: Get these!!
customer_reviews.text: Sharp as s***! I love these! The basically glide thru everything i put to the test fabric tags vinyl ect. Get these!
customer_reviews.author: Linsay Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable sharp scissors
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to hold and cut very well, seem sharp. Shipped quickly, love these.
customer_reviews.author: Cora in LA

customer_reviews.title: Great scissors
customer_reviews.text: Really, these are great scissors, not much else to say. I liked them well enough that I bought a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ugly green color but they work really well
customer_reviews.text: Ugly green color but they work really well. Sharp blades - smooth action too.
customer_reviews.author: G. Crinnion

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable grip
customer_reviews.text: Love these scissors. I use them a lot and they have a comfortable grip.
customer_reviews.author: Michele W

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of scissors
customer_reviews.text: These are the greatest scissors easy to use fits my hands perfectly I have big hands very sharp
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM HARRIS

customer_reviews.title: Durable product
customer_reviews.text: I use these scissors to cut 7 mil plastic and cardboard on a daily basis. They are the best scissors for shrink wrap. Super sharp. Very comfortable fit in my hand. Easy to get fingers in and out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Leca Logan

customer_reviews.title: Best scissors I’ve ever had and will have them for years!
customer_reviews.text: Best scissors I’ve ever had and will have them for years!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Really nice scissors you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best scissors I have ever used there awesome
customer_reviews.author: Tom W

customer_reviews.title: Nice Scissor
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice scissors and cuts well...but seems to be more suited to men or someone with larger hands. Seems clumsy with smaller hands.
customer_reviews.author: Canton Mills Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Best Utility Scissors EVER
customer_reviews.text: I know it's silly to gush over a pair of scissors, but these things are so smooth they turn cutting through thick cardboard and plastic packaging into an almost sensual experience...I really feel like that's saying something!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Meier

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scissors!
customer_reviews.text: I lost my favorite pair of scissors! I loved these scissors so much! They are awesome, and work VERY well. I bought them for Christmas wrapping and ended up using them for multiple reasons! Highly recommend. And probably will buy another pair here in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Pike

customer_reviews.title: Well done
customer_reviews.text: Ecaxtly as expected, durable and very easy to use; cuts well.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Nice Scissors but they were huge and thirty with scuffs marks as if they were laying around the floor. Not happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna Coss

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and sharp
customer_reviews.text: Used it to cut up a cardboard box into small pieces for an art project, and it worked wonderfully. Took me a little bit to get used to the grip, but thereafter it was very worthy.
customer_reviews.author: Neesha101

customer_reviews.title: Best Scissors ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the strongest soldiers I’ve ever used. They are so versatile. I cut paper and plastic zip ties And still stay sharp. After using a pair for a year I purchased 4 more for work, the shop and home.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Great Scissors
customer_reviews.text: We had crappy old scissors in our drawer for years. It's a pleasure every time I use one of these scissors.
customer_reviews.author: BigPaul321

customer_reviews.title: super quality very fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: I needed a means to cut along a sewn seam it had to be a sharp point these are just what I needed, super quality very fast delivery, THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: L. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, heavy pair of scissors. I like everything! The heft, fit in my hand, texture for stability, color. They cut very nice and easy!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: A good, sturdy scissors
customer_reviews.text: We have one of these in the kitchen and one in our home office. Sturdy and easy to grip. We haven't asked it to do anything it wasn't able to do - it's just a good basic scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Sheepish Reader 'n' Writer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.  Super sharp and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best scissors I have ever used. Bought 2 sets.
customer_reviews.author: Bobyn7

customer_reviews.title: cheap trash!
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months became dull from paper ! Garbage !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dmitriy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy scissors for the price
customer_reviews.text: The blades feel stumpy and if used heavily they start to hurt my hand. Good for keeping around the house for random uses.
customer_reviews.author: Oshika789

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty scissors
customer_reviews.text: These are great and as in the description they are heavy duty. They will cut through material that others will not.
customer_reviews.author: unclejehu

customer_reviews.title: Good scissors!
customer_reviews.text: Good size but is a little hard to cut. To much tension between the blades.
customer_reviews.author: Debi Rose

customer_reviews.title: Works great -- card board, heavy stock paper -Perfect for Crafting
customer_reviews.text: These scissors are fantastic. They really are heavy duty scissors. I have no issues cutting just about anything I need to from cardboard to really think paper. Perfect for crafting.
customer_reviews.author: Gina CentralTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy duty scissors
customer_reviews.text: These work as intended and i am pleased with them. I actually have 3 pairs. I haven't used them on heavy fabric yet.
customer_reviews.author: Deith

customer_reviews.title: Great Scissor
customer_reviews.text: A great scissors did not have any issues with it, work as described. Did not have problem at all cutting through anything, great for at work or home use.
customer_reviews.author: DT8891

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Very high build quality. When you hold these in your hands you feel like you're able to cut through a car. They are heavy, feel great in the handle, and don't feel like the blade will warp or bend like on cheaper scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Billiam

customer_reviews.title: Strong, sharp and useful.
customer_reviews.text: These seem pretty robust. The handle doesn't fit my hand quite perfect but well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Dwarf Eight

customer_reviews.title: These are really good!
customer_reviews.text: I could cut a tomato with these if I wanted to - careful they are sharp! Well constructed product!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Great Scissors
customer_reviews.text: These are great scissors and put previous purchases to shame! I use them for cutting burlap paper and now realize how bad my previous scissors were!

customer_reviews.text: they cut very well with little effort -- would buy again when needed

customer_reviews.title: SHARP and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Exceptionally sharp scissors and the design makes it easy to cut heavy stock.

customer_reviews.title: Super durable, clean cut
customer_reviews.text: Love these general purpose shears. I use them in the office and they have yet to disappoint

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite scissors.
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite scissors. These are great! Very heavy duty.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic scissors. I used them to cut vinyl tile , wire, cardboard and countless other things. They worked great. Extremely sharp and sturdy. I want to buy more even though I don't need too lol.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Geffert

customer_reviews.title: Great value and well made scissors.
customer_reviews.text: Cuts through a plastic milk jug as if it were made of thin paper. I cannot state that for other scissors I have purchased on Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Strong Scissors
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and strong scissors. Don't need much effort to obtain a good, strong cut, either. Very Nice.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for vinyl cutting
customer_reviews.text: These babies are great for cutting vinyl and other ticker materials. The grip and angle is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Urbina

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty enough to cut through thick plastic!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome scissors. I used these to cut through heavy duty plastic containers in a project. I got these for $4 less than what they were at the Walmart store.

customer_reviews.title: Repeat purchase
customer_reviews.text: I use these daily at work. The only work scissors I buy. Great cutting edge and quality product

customer_reviews.title: Great Scissors
customer_reviews.text: For the price they can't be beat. Easy on the hands, very sharp, and heavy duty.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cuts well.
customer_reviews.text: Been great so far. Comfortable and easily cuts. I wrote “Kitchen” on it so it wouldn’t walk away from said kitchen. Hope it lasts. Looks like it will.
